info.author: Jerome Kieffer
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
The two main applications are:
* selector for image visualization & selection
* generator for static web page generation (static web pages are a feature ...)

Work is ongoing mainly on the video side but also on deRAWtisation, multi-threading of the GUI and of the processing.
info.name: imagizer
info.summary: Set of tools to manage photos & videos repositories (sort, publish, archive)
info.html_description:
The two main applications are: * selector for image visualization & selection * generator for static web page generation (static web pages are a feature …)

Work is ongoing mainly on the video side but also on deRAWtisation, multi-threading of the GUI and of the processing.
